The game can be a mixed bag. One game as survivor can have you grouped as a survivor with 3 brain dead fuck sticks that cant finish a gen to save their life. The next group will execute a flawless victory and you'll be out in 5 mins. Be warned, the grind in this game is fucking insane.

Das beste Spiel was ich bis jetzt auf Steam hatte wo ich mit Abstand am meisten Spielstunden habe. Das Spiel ist einfach nur super spa√üig (Vorallem mit Freunden) !!! Ich kann jedem nur empfehelen dieses Spiel selbst mal auszuprobieren!

Its definitly a fun game if you're looking for an intense if youre new, or hiliarious if youre experienced, time. The game is definitly flawed most notably in its matchmaking and its bugs/hitboxes. However you will only run into issues like that on a rare basis. However its community isnt the most friendly the higher you climb the rankings. You'll run into alot of toxic survivor teammates and salty killers who will use the most pathetic strategies to make your experience as survivor as painful as possible. However overall, it is fantastic. The complexity and grind is in my opinion despite being repetitive, quite satisfying and easy to forget about when youre just enjoying the game and it is an absolute BLAST when youre playing with friends. If you ever get a chance to convince your friends into playing this game please do it is much more fun with friends as a party game. And playing killer is also very satisfying as long as you arent in red ranks. The perk system is extremely versatile and fun to learn. Despite it maybe being slightly overwhelming for new players I encourage you to take the time to experiment and look up videos on youtube on fun and unique perk builds. One thing Im a little mixed on is the dlcs and the cosmetics. Despite the dlcs being incredible and fun to play with especially as a new killer, it also has its drawbacks of being borderline pay to win as aside from the shrine of secrets (a store that sells teachable perks in exchange for shards you get for leveling up), there is no way of getting killer and survivor exclusive perks unless you buy the dlcs, which although being cheap sure, are still behind a pay wall that some players may not be fortunate enough to afford. The cosmetics are very inconsistant, some are very cool and others are painfully dull and not worth the price tag given. But all this is definitly outshined by how damn fun this game is. Even if you dont have a big group of friends to play survive with friends with, there are plenty of discord servers where there are players in the same boat as you. So give the game a chance despite some of the crazy criticism the game is given. I did and I love the game even after coming back from a long break.
new patch made the game fun for killer and survivor :)

once i played a game of dbd in my game the killer only camped me he got gen rush and didn't budge or help me team plz help :( soon may the entity come to claim our souls and we cannot run one day when the trial done we start all again and go...

The game is great overall regarding to it's genre, the graphics are absolutely good, gameplay wise it is majorly balance between being the survivor and the killer. This game tends to be repetitive and tiring to play sometimes but a bit of experimentation with survivors and killers perks it's kinda fun, overall this game is so fun to play with friends.
Stop asking me to play this I beg you

Don't waste your time with this game. The game is reliant on a gentleman's agreement - the devs don't want to balance anything about their game. The community is toxic, and the elo/ranked system makes less sense than the Ontario governments COVID restrictions.

the thrill of being chased by your worst fear is fantastic.

Highly addictive game once you get the hang of things as both killer and survivor! 

Only gripe i have is that the ranking system seems a bit busted and sometimes abused. Often then none i find alot of obvious red ranks teaming up with level 17-20 to pair up with lower ranked killers. This seems alittle too unfair and i personally believe there should be some kind of rank barrier. For example if someone is rank 20 they cannot pair up with people ranks 10-1  or something along those lines. It would balance out the abuse of the system and put low ranked killers with other low rank survivors making the game more fair for the killer. 

OVERALL THOUGH!
Very VERY fun game to play if you like survival horror games. BUT MULTIPLAYER! 
I'm interested in others peoples thoughts on my "Rank Barrier" discussion so i've enabled comments! <3

Got the game years ago for some playing with friends fun. And it was. Came back recently (pandemic gaming woo) and still had fun with friends! But solo its rough. Lotta toxic players on both sides of the game. 

From a game side a very big grind the devs seem proud of? Why grind for marginal improvements when you can play other games.
